CreateApiImportUserJob.document: creating an api for user import task
CreateApiImportUserJob.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ciam.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateApiImportUserJob
<Common request parameters>

{
    "UserStoreId": "2c3aca3b****************a7efe88e",
    "DataFlowUserCreateList": [
        {
            "UserName": "zhangsan",
            "PhoneNumber": "132****0000",
            "Email": "132****@qq.com",
            "ResidentIdentityCard": "123456789012345678",
            "Nickname": "nick name",
            "Address": "address",
            "UserGroup": [
                "6cd22e51****************f6f7cb81"
            ],
            "QqOpenId": "qqopenid",
            "QqUnionId": "qqunionid",
            "WechatOpenId": "wechatopenid",
            "WechatUnionId": "wechatunionid",
            "AlipayUserId": "alipayuserid",
            "WeComUserId": "wecomuserid",
            "Description": "user1",
            "Birthdate": "2022-10-20",
            "Name": "name",
            "Locale": "locale",
            "Gender": "male",
            "IdentityVerificationMethod": "PASSWORD",
            "IdentityVerified": true,
            "Job": "employee",
            "Nationality": "nationality",
            "Zone": "zone",
            "Password": "password",
            "CustomizationAttributes": [
                {
                    "Name": "nickname",
                    "Value": "nike name",
                    "Type": "STRING"
                }
            ],
            "Salt": {
                "SaltValue": "salt***",
                "SaltLocation": {
                    "SaltLocationTypeEnum": "HEAD",
                    "SaltLocationRule": {
                        "Regex": "passwordabc123"
                    }
                }
            },
            "PasswordEncryptTypeEnum": "SHA1",
            "IndexedAttribute1": "value1",
            "IndexedAttribute2": "value2",
            "IndexedAttribute3": "value3",
            "IndexedAttribute4": "value4",
            "IndexedAttribute5": "value5"
        }
    ]
}
CreateApiImportUserJob.title: Creating an API for user import task
